storyInfo:
Coming off the unsuccessful attempt on Enciodes's life, and in the dire moment, Monch chooses to jump off a cliff.
None of this seems to take Enciodes at all by surprise, however. The Grand Ceremony is about to commence.

attributes.content: Are all the preparations in place?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Sir Gnosis!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: May I ask you a question...?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Now this is rare. This might be the first time you've asked me anything.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: If I may be so bold.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: I'm afraid that the Browntails might get caught up in the investigation that follows, if we go through with our plan.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: I... I'm just worried that, now that you and the Browntails have formed an alliance, wouldn't it be detrimental to your plan if anything should happen to the Browntails?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: I've considered that, but it doesn't matter. What becomes of the Browntails isn't important. This is a rare opportunity, and I do not want it to go to waste.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: At the same time, I hope you'll know to save your own skin.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Should worst come to pass, you needn't think about the Browntails. I know Enciodes. If your testimony is useful to him, he won't harm you. At least for the time being.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: And when the time comes, I will send men to ensure your safety.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Sir Gnosis! I...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: If you are having any second thoughts, we can bring others to execute this plan in your stead.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: No...! Please, let me do it!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Whatever your orders, Sir Gnosis...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Your wish is my command.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: We've taken care of all the beasts now!
attributes.name: Old Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: Some of the young'uns got a few scratches here and there. Nothing major at all... It's all thanks to you, Great Saintess!
attributes.name: Old Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: I haven't done anything. Rather, all of you have admirably demonstrated your courage in battle. I am sure Kjeragandr is proud of all of you, Her soldiers.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Y-You flatter us!
attributes.name: Old Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: Great Saintess!
attributes.name: Young Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: Hm? You're... the one from earlier...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Right, it's me. Thank you for saving my life just now!
attributes.name: Young Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: Great Saintess! That was far too risky!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Nonetheless, I have to thank you for saving this runt!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: We are all children of Kjeragandr, and it's only natural for me to save one of my own.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Great Saintess...!
attributes.name: Young Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: That was truly a fine shot. I didn't know you were such a capable archer...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: The Saintess must be able to protect the people of the Snow Realm. This is hardly worth mentioning.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You're too humble! With your shot just now, your marksmanship most definitely rivals even that of Kjerag's finest archers!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Great Saintess! Sir Arctosz, Madame Ratatos!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warriors

attributes.content: T-This is bad!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warriors

attributes.content: What are you babbling about? How is any of this bad?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You're one of the Silverashes? What's the matter? Don't tell me you were ambushed by beasts and Enciodes is looking for our help.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: N-No, not beasts!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warriors

attributes.content: Then what is it? Out with it!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Y-Yes! Sir Enciodes was ambushed by an assassin!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warriors

attributes.content: What did you just say...?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Enciodes was ambushed? Somebody's so bold to make a move on him during the Holy Hunt?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Half of you, stay here to protect the Saintess. Stay alert.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The rest of you, come with me!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Wait, Arctosz, are you out of your mind?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What are you doing? Are you going to his aid? Before we even mention whether Enciodes really needs it or not, considering the circumstances... Have you really thought it through?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: There's nothing to think through, Ratatos.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I know what you are thinking, but it doesn't matter to me one bit whether Enciodes is really turning over a new leaf or is just putting on a show. I, Arctosz, won't permit anyone to make trouble during the Holy Hunt!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: —Generation after generation, my family has sworn to defend Kjerag, and that includes the integrity of the Holy Hunt!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Can't keep your cool, can you... Whatever, let's see where this kindness of yours will get us.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Enciodes...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes! You're bleeding... Are you hurt?!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warriors

attributes.content: I'm fine. No need to panic.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But you're injured!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warriors

attributes.content: It's nothing major.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Fine stealth techniques. You caught me unaware... though I suppose it was careless of me to assume no one would make trouble during the Holy Hunt.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What's the matter? Not going to show yourself?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If you had the courage to do this on such an occasion, surely you knew what a great disrespect it was to Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Come now. Did you not consider this?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You can stop taunting me...
If I'm brave enough to do this, of course I've considered the consequences.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Enciodes, if I don't make it out of these hunting grounds today, you're coming down with me!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Looks like you are truly determined.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That goes without saying!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Enciodes, you act like a devout follower, but you don't have even the tiniest bit of veneration for Kjeragandr. All of us can see the damage you've brought to Kjerag!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: It's not often that someone says as much to me outright. There aren't that many in Kjerag who bear such a great grudge against me these days, after all.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: For you to criticize me like that, I must have done something to harm your profits... or perhaps you are a truly devout, even radical follower...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Now which is it?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Do you think I'd just tell you?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes, watch out!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warriors

attributes.content: Out of my way!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Regrettable.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You had these berserk beasts prepared in advance, didn't you? I don't have many guards accompanying me during the Holy Hunt, and it's indeed a good chance to strike while they are preoccupied.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And yet... it looks like you've wasted your one chance.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Are you mocking me?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: You're hurt. It doesn't matter how lightly you make out your injuries, you can't fool me!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Your movement is starting to get sluggish, isn't it? I just have to land one more hit and...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Despite the circumstances?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Now that we're facing off in the open, how confident are you in landing a fatal shot?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Tsk...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Let's find out, shall we?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Dammit... You can block arrows with that cane?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Are you screwing with me?!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Please don't get the wrong idea. It is not my intention to look down on you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You came well-prepared, and you have an excellent plan. However, all plans must face be put into motion, and they rarely survive contact with the enemy.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: My hope is that everything can be solved by diplomacy, but one of my companions possesses exactly that level of violence. Thanks to her, I understand violent people well.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What are you talking about?!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Still not showing your true face? Or am I mistaken?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It's a little hard to slice through an arrow after all.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: You—!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: But that's just part of the job, Mr. Enciodes.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: So, will you two keep the fight up?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: That is not for me to decide.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Giving up is the best course of action here. At the very least, no lives will be lost.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You can drop the kind act. It disgusts me.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: You want to get information from me, don't you? You want to know who it is that wants your life.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: I've considered that, but it doesn't matter. What becomes of the Browntails isn't important. This is a rare opportunity, and I do not want it to go to waste.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: At the same time, I hope you'll know to save your own skin.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Should worst come to pass, you needn't think about the Browntails. I know Enciodes. If your testimony is useful to him, he won't harm you. At least for the time being.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Monch, Monch!
Where'd you go! Come help take a look at my plan. This one will show Ratatos, for sure!
Oh, Monch, I knew you had my back. Everyone else's always calling me dumb. Hah, they think I don't know...
Monch, tell me. Do you think I make something of the Browntails? I can, right? Right...? Yep! I knew you wouldn't lie to me!
Monch...!
—I won't let you!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Her movement is swift as always, as though she is leaping across a river, and as though she is leaping off a tree.
In an instant, her black figure springs off the ground, before falling and disappearing below the cliffs.
She leapt off...
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: An unexpected choice.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You didn't stop her.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That's not part of my mission.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: You don't seem so surprised either.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: There aren't many who can properly set up the pieces on the hunting grounds. If we search for evidence, we're bound to find some.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Of course, having a witness would've saved us some trouble... Though whether the witness is alive or dead doesn't actually matter all that much.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Your underlings are absent...
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Perhaps they are tied up with the beasts running amok.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: About that, please be sure to thank the Doctor for me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Master!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: What's the situation?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: All taken care of. Some of our men are hurt, but nothing major.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: I just got some news from Weiss—
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Sharp? What are you doing here...?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: I'm on a mission.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Doctor's orders? Did the Doctor anticipate this...?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: How did you know it was me?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: It's not that hard at all.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I already told you. I'm very familiar with warriors who can break a deadlock.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Enciodes!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Are you alright? Where's the assassin?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Arctosz, I never expected to see you here. Perhaps this is a portent of the Silverashes and Paleroches finally burying the hatchet?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Pfft! I'm here, but that's got nothing to do with you!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'm only here to flush out the underhanded lowlife who dared to disrupt Kjeragandr's Grand Ceremony! They will pay for this!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You are truly Kjeragandr's most faithful follower, Arctosz.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'm afraid you came too late, though.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What do you mean? You would never let an assassin go. Where are you hiding him?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Wait, this cliff... Don't tell me...!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Exactly, Arctosz. My men will look for any traces of her.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Let's continue our hunt.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: There's blood on the ground. Are you hurt?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It's nothing major.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Master, we must treat your wounds immediately!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: We must... We must at least stop the bleeding!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: We're getting back to the hunt.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I refuse to ruin Kjeragandr's ceremony.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Send the word out that all is well.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Before everyone's eyes, the young head of the Silverash clan takes a step forward.
The snow blows all around him, scattering as he gazes upward. There is not a single scripture that describes such a sight.
The patches of red behind him gradually turn fainter in color, before finally leaving nothing but pure white that blends into the mountainous scenery.
No one can stop him. No one dares to.
Enciodes keeps walking straight ahead.
